title: Heart and Soul Organic Chai Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, International, Organic, Western
description: Vegetarian cafe serving breakfast, lunch, and afternoon tea. Uses dairy but not eggs. Many dishes are vegan and gluten free. Lunch menu features curries, vegetable and legume/tofu dishes with salads and chutneys. Beverages include fresh juices, smoothies, coffee, and caffeine-free hot drinks with a range of milks. Free Wi-Fi.
